cmp: 包 (to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/to contract (to or for))
mng: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté, to fry, to dry by heating

exm.mng: to open fire with artillery, to set off firecrackers, to make one's stage debut, (slang) to have sex, to masturbate
the hot pillar (ancient Chinese torture instrument)
to concoct, to invent, to fabricate, to produce, to process, processing and curing (Chinese medicine)
